# External Dependencies

## nlohmann/json

This folder should contain `json.hpp` from the nlohmann/json library.

### Download Instructions

1. Visit: https://github.com/nlohmann/json/releases
2. Download the latest `json.hpp` single-header file
3. Place it in this directory as `json.hpp`

Or use PowerShell:

```powershell
cd "C++ Enas 2\external"
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nlohmann/json/develop/single_include/nlohmann/json.hpp" -OutFile "json.hpp"
```

The file should be located at: `C++ Enas 2/external/json.hpp`
